name: DextromethorphanDiphenhydraminePhenylephrine
title: Dextromethorphan / Diphenhydramine / Phenylephrine
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent dextromethorphan / diphenhydramine / phenylephrine combination medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Medication, Ordered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with semantic clinical drugs (concepts associated with component, form and strength); generic; human use only; prescribable; dextromethorphan / diphenhydramine / phenylephrine (combination medication).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes branded drugs; components or ingredient only; non-prescribable; dextromethorphan / diphenhydramine / phenylephrine in combination with other medications.)

contains.display: {1 (brompheniramine maleate 0.2 MG/ML / dextromethorphan hydrobromide 1 MG/ML / phenylephrine hydrochloride 0.5 MG/ML Oral Solution) / 1 (diphenhydramine hydrochloride 1.25 MG/ML / phenylephrine hydrochloride 0.5 MG/ML Oral Solution) } Pack
